subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Bernard Tomic of Australia won his first ATP title, beating South Africa’s Kevin Anderson, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 6-3, in the Sydney International final at Olympic Park.
snippet: Bernard Tomic of Australia won his first ATP title, beating South Africa’s Kevin Anderson, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 6-3, in the Sydney International final at Olympic Park.
